DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Radiation Therapy Modification Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator as to whether there were any alterations or changes to the study radiotherapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/26/18 TT released/CWinch. 6/15/18 tt edits per form change. 6/12/18 tt/MA39.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Were there any modifications
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were there any modifications (unplanned interruptions, dose adjustments, early discontinuation or change to treatment plan) to the protocol radiotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Aside from interruptions and early discontinuation, were any modifications made to the radiotherapy treatment that did not follow protocol (e.g. total dose, number of fractions, other planning parameters)?

DataElement.changeDescription: 11/26/18 TT released/CWinch. 6/15/18 tt edits per form change. 6/12/18 tt/MA39.
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 12/12/23 Added 4 alt OIDs AQT for CCTG ticket number CADSR0003179 cjl; /7/23 Added AQT and alt OID for CCTG for ticket number CADSR0003018 cjl; 11/6/23 Added alt OID, CCTG for ticket number CADSR0003018 cjl.
